titleStmt.title: A full relation of the particulars and manner of the late great victory obtained against Iames Marquesse of Montrosse, in Scotland. VVith a perfect list of the names of the lords, gentlemen, and chiefe officers which were taken and slain in the fight.

publicationStmt.publisher: First printed at Edenburgh by order from the Committee of Estates, and now reprinted at London by E.G. in the Old-baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
